overview:
Jonathan’s skill set is a combination of corporate business development, 100% commission sales and entrepreneurial experience in the mortgage, entertainment and technology fields.

Jonathan has the following technical skills; website development, programming, internet marketing, business contracts preparation and negotiation.

Jonathan’s Career Highlights Include

  • Going into 100% commission sales a few weeks after graduating high school.
  • The youngest banker hired by US Bank.
  • Within 2 years of founding an entertainment marketing firm was coordinating and throwing events at Denver top nightclubs and Invesco Field at Mile High
  • Has worked with +100 clients since launching a web development and marketing firm in 2008
  • Consulting startup companies in a variety industries ranging from real estate and lead generation to entertainment and firearms.

Jonathan is passionate about entrepreneurship, history, trans humanism and is also the inventor of the most clever cocktail toast ever.
